# Introduction

## Project Description:-

1.  The objective of this project will be analyzing and interpreting the raw borehole repair data to improve decision making.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
borehole <- read_csv(here::here("data/raw/borehole_repair_data.csv"))
```

```{r}
glimpse(borehole)
```

```{r}
new_well_yield <- borehole |> 
   rename("well_yield" = "well_yield_(m^3/hr)")
```

```{r}
glimpse(new_well_yield)

new_well_yield |> 
  filter(is.na(community))
```

```{r}
processed_borehole_data <- new_well_yield |>  drop_na()
```

```{r}
glimpse(processed_borehole_data)
```

```{r}
write.csv(here::here("data/raw/processed_borehole_data.csv"))

```
